productinfo.name: RANGE ROVER VELAR
productinfo.description: Range Rover Velar plug-in electric hybrid (PHEV) offers the best of all worlds, with hybrid technology combining a 105kW electric motor and Ingenium petrol engine. Enjoy seamless electric driving with a certified range of up to 65km (40 miles)††.

productinfo.name: BENTLEY BENTAYGA
productinfo.description: The Bentayga gets a new range-topping Mulliner trim for 2024 that comes with unique exterior design elements and can be specified in almost 4000 different interior color combinations.

productinfo.name: ROLLS ROYCE SPECTRE
productinfo.description: All Spectres will come with a dual-motor electric powertrain with 577 horsepower and 664 lb-ft of torque. After taking the Spectre on a test drive, we estimate that the electric powertrain will move the 6559-pound coupe to 60 mph in 4.2 seconds.

productinfo.name: MERCEDES-MAYBACH-S-CLASS
productinfo.description: A Night Series appearance package is now available for the Maybach S-class that features darkened chrome exterior accents peppered with rose-gold details in the headlamps. The Night Series models come in gray, black, or white exterior colors or can be had with a two-tone Onyx Black and Mojave Silver scheme.
